bibl.title: Letter from Felix E. Fernandez to Philip Showalter Hench, September 11, 1940

div1.p: Fernandez sends Hench the address of John R. Taylor.

div1.head: Letter from Felix E. Fernandez to Philip Showalter Hench, September 11, 1940
div1.opener:
Havana, September 11, 1940.
Dr. Philip S. Hench.
102-110 Second Ave.
Rochester Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Please excuse me if I did not reply your letter
before, but i was sick last days. Latest direction of Mr John R.
Taylor that I have is, 548 Grand Ave.- Upper Darby.- Pa.
I shall be very glad if I can serve you something more.
div1.closer:
I remain, yours very trully Dr. Félix E. Fernández Add.
Luis Estevez # 461.
Vibora. - Habana.
